keepConnect.name: Hlala uqhagamshelwe
keepConnect.helperText: Ukuba ucofa kwikhonkco lokuqala, emva koko gcina ikhonkco. Oku kufuna ingqalelo yokuba ikhonkco liya kuphinda lidityaniswe ngokuqhubekayo emva kokuba linqatshelwe.

url.name: I-URL
url.error: I-URL echanekileyo yi-URL eqala nge-WS: // okanye i-WWS: //
